title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: Soupiere (underlined); lower right: aluminum.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Circular tureen drawn in elevation. Rounded lid surmounted by an arched handle attached to lid by two applied bands. Handle appears to continue onto sides of the body. Raised on a thick circular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen", ca. 1920–40.
ca. 1920–40. Pen and black ink on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-46.
